top.title: Trump says Iran has 'no plan' to execute protesters
top.summary: The US president does not rule out military action in Iran, as Tehran temporarily shuts its airspace to nearly all flights.

top.title: 'I carried my wife's body for an hour and a half' - BBC hears stories of protesters killed in Iran
top.summary: BBC Persian has received dozens of accounts from inside Iran, with witnesses saying they want to ensure the world knew of the violence against protesters.

top.title: Zelensky declares energy emergency as biting cold persists
top.summary: The move comes as US President Donald Trump said Ukraine is "less ready" than the Russian president to make a peace deal.

top.title: X to stop Grok AI from undressing images of real people after backlash
top.summary: Grok will no longer allow users to remove clothing from images of real people in jurisdictions where it is illegal.

top.title: No 10 welcomes reports X is addressing Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The use of the AI tool to digitally undress women has sparked a backlash as well as intervention from the government and regulator.

top.title: Honey, I shrunk the data centres: Is small the new big?
top.summary: Huge data centres are being built to handle AI computing but some experts say they aren't necessary.

title.#text: The best e-reader to buy right now
X claims it has stopped Grok from undressing people, but of course it hasn’t
The Stream Deck Plus is back to its lowest price
